snippet: The police in the capital of Baku on Friday clashed with about 200 Muslim activists who were protesting a ban on the wearing of head scarves in the nation’s secondary schools.
abstract: Police in Baku, Azerbaijan, clash with about 200 Muslim activists protesting ban on the wearing of head scarves in secondary schools.
lead_paragraph: The police in the capital of Baku on Friday clashed with about 200 Muslim activists who were protesting a ban on the wearing of head scarves in the nation’s secondary schools.

headline.seo: Azerbaijan Sees Clashes Over Hijab Ban
headline.main: Clash Over Hijab Ban in Azerbaijan
headline.print_headline: Clash Over Hijab Ban in Azerbaijan
